name: Owl, Giant
languages: Giant Owl,understands Common,Elvish,and Sylvan but can't speak them

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The owl's Perception is 20 when perceiving by hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Quiet Wings
special_abilities.desc: The owl's Stealth is 19 while flying.
